email_text:
Subject: Urgent: Apple ID Lockout Notification

Dear Valued Apple User,

We regret to inform you that we have detected some unusual activity on your Apple ID account. Our system has detected multiple failed login attempts and suspicious activities on your account, which has led to a temporary lockout for security reasons.

To ensure the security of your account and prevent any unauthorized access, we kindly request you to reset your Apple ID password immediately. Please click on the link below to proceed with the password reset process:

[Link to fake Apple login page]

Failure to reset your password within the next 24 hours will result in a permanent lockout of your Apple ID account. We urge you to act promptly to avoid any inconvenience and potential security risks.

Thank you for your cooperation and understanding in this matter. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your prompt attention to this issue.

Sincerely,
Apple Support Team
